arts.ttl: Paul Merson spots 'criminal' Arsenal act which cost Mikel Arteta victory vs Fulham
arts.sum: Arsenal icon Paul Merson has slammed winger Gabriel Martinelli after he was caught offside in the build-up to Bukayo Saka's ruled-out winner against Fulham in the Premier League. However, their celebrations were cut short when VAR found that Martinelli was offside in the build-up despite looking down the line on the far side of the pitch.

arts.ttl: Premier League forced to release two VAR statements after Fulham vs Arsenal late drama
arts.sum: Explaining the decision, the Premier League's Match Centre tweeted: "The refereeâ€™s call of goal was checked and confirmed by the VAR as Saliba was in an onside position." While that decision went in the Gunner's favour, they would fall victim to a decision going against them late on. However, a VAR check found that Martinelli had strayed just into an offside position in the build-up and the goal was ruled out.

arts.ttl: Arsenal receive Viktor Gyokeres transfer boost after major Manchester United decision
arts.sum: Arsenal have been handed a potentially significant boost in the reported pursuit of Sporting CP striker Viktor Gyokeres following the announcement of sporting director Dan Ashworth's departure from rivals Manchester United - which was confirmed on Sunday morning . Gyokeres has also been heavily linked with Premier League rivals United, not least because former Sporting CP manager Ruben Amorim recently replaced Erik ten Hag in the Old Trafford dugout.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta admits he is 'gutted' after missing a crucial chance to close the gap on Liverpool... but insists Arsenal were 'really strong and dominant' during 1-1 draw with Fulham
arts.sum: ISAAN KHAN AT CRAVEN COTTAGE: Bukayo Saka thought he had earned the Gunners all three points after heading in Gabriel Martinelli's cross two minutes from time. But the goal was disallowed.

arts.ttl: Fulham 1-1 Arsenal: Mikel Arteta reacts to disallowed Bukayo Saka goal and gives Gabriel injury update
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta is left to lament the 'millimetre' margins as the Gunners are held to a 1-1 draw by London rivals Fulham in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Arsenal face ghosts of Christmas past as title hopes suffer fresh blow in costly Fulham draw
arts.sum: Arsenal were held to a draw by Fulham on Sunday to leave them six points adrift of leaders Liverpool in an eery replay of what happened to their title bid last Christmas

arts.sum: As was the case for the Gunners last season at Craven Cottage, Fulham frustrated Arsenal and held them back in pursuit of the Premier League...

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta says Arsenal â€˜cannot cryâ€™ after title push dented by Fulham draw
arts.sum: The Gunners could have cut the gap to leaders Liverpool to four points with a win at Craven Cottage.
